column1: Vision- what we want to be
Abertay is committed to being an excellent university, equal to the best in Scotland and making its own unique contribution to society.

Our Mission is to provide a distinctive and high-quality university education that empowers our graduates socially, culturally and economically, and to generate new knowledge and learning that reinforces national competitiveness.
We will grow and develop as an academic community dedicated to fostering self-confidence, ambition, leadership, passion and success.
We will achieve and promote these values through:
• Being open and attuned to the potential of all who can benefit from or contribute to the Abertay experience

column1: Strategic Priorities: how we will realise our vision

Our primary aim is to add value to Scottish higher education, and to society and the economy at large, by meeting the educational and knowledge transfer needs of industry, commerce, the professions and the public services.
column2: We will achieve this aim through:

column1: <li>Becoming a world-class teaching institution providing a provocative and inspiring learning environment in which students will develop entrepreneurial spirit, creative flair, professional skills and breadth of knowledge.&nbsp
column2: These are the qualities they will need to be able to exploit emergent technologies, to contribute to and lead business creation and growth, and to enhance and strengthen public services

column1: <li>Developing world-class research strengths in those areas where we can make a unique and high value contribution.&nbsp
column2: This will be our contribution to helping society address the challenges posed by a global knowledge economy, accelerating technological development, societal and cultural evolution, and environmental change.
